website_summaries.verdict: We recommend this wristlet for consumers who like the idea of faux leather and need ample space, provided they don't mind dealing with an odor that may or may not fade over time.
pros: A good choice for ladies who like the look of leather but prefer man-made vegan materials
Comes with both wrist and shoulder straps
Spacious enough for most cell phones
cons: Owners of this wristlet gripe about it having a strange odor they describe as smelling like fish or chemicals
Some bags have subpar zippers known to spontaneously open or jam

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and hangs weird
customer_reviews.text: This purse is very soft - it ends up feeling kind of flimsy and cheap (well, it is cheap, so can't really complain). The annoying thing is that the buckles that hold the shoulder straps are attached to one of the outer panels of the purse, rather than the center, so if you put your phone in the opposite panel from the one that has the shoulder straps, your purse will hang parallel to the ground. Kind of hard to explain, but it's very annoying that I have to check which side to put my phone in every time (or have something of equal weight on the other side to balance it out).
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Bad Zipper
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this item, I thought it was very nice looking with great functionality. It holds credit cards, drivers licence and cell phone well. I took it on a trip loaded up with cards, small items, and phone. Then I discovered that the zipper didn't work - it would separate in the middle and not stay zipped. All my items fell out all over the airport. The zipper was not fixable so this item is basically useless now. Really annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most Loved Bag in Closet
customer_reviews.text: I cannot take my eyes off this bag. It is a gorgeous, subdued brown. It is ultimately very versatile using it via cross-body or by the wristlet strap. The card slots comfortably hold my drivers license, insurance card, credit card and debit card. The center zippered section holds all of my change well with ease. The two open-faced sections easily hold the following: a hair tie, Burt's Bees lip balm, a few tissues, gift cards, coupons and quite a lot of cash. The crossbody strap is adjustable so it works for anyone on the height spectrum very well. I am 5'11 and experience no issues whatsoever. I am very happy with this product. I cannot leave my apartment without it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Small and holds all my stuff
customer_reviews.text: When you don't want to take your bigger purse, This allows you to scale down what you actually need. Comes with a wrist strap and a shoulder strap. 6 slots for credit cards and ID. Three compartments that will actually hold lipstick, pens, cash, phone, and all other things that will not fit into slimmer wallets. All of the contents are zipped up for when you accidently drop this and empty all the contents on the ground. Soft and luxurious feel.
customer_reviews.author: Cora

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the necessities
customer_reviews.text: Holds my Pixel (with a giant case), a tiny wallet, car key, and other loose like things perfectly. Honestly it could hold a lot more! I love this style for throwing into my larger work purse or diaper bag and not worry about forgetting the critical items. The champagne is beautiful - fancy, but not too shiny or sparkly. I've had it for a while now with daily use and it looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Really cute purse!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this purse to use for a wedding. It is an ideal size to hold my phone, make-up, and small necessities. The color is very pretty and was perfect to go with my bridesmaid outfit. I used it as a wristlet but there is a long cross- body strap that comes with it too. I will definitely get regular use out of this purse. I read other reviews that made me hesitant to buy, but I’m glad I didn’t listen. Those reviews complained of a bad smell but my product was just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Reeks like citronella!
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this 2 stars based on the one I purchased about a year ago that’s wearing out. I need to replace it so have gone through 3, yes THREE replacements that all reek of citronella. So badly that it’s been on my hands after opening the package and touching the purse and I’ve had to scrub my hands. Sad, because I adore the one I have but am done ordering and returning to try to find a bag that doesn’t smell like a mosquito candle.
customer_reviews.author: MissyBee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this bag, but it was ultimately a fail. Just as other commenters have noted, the bag has a fishy odor about it. I let it air out for a few days and it dissipated, but the credit card slots are also too short to use, which makes them useless. The zippers worked okay but felt cheap, as though they might give me trouble down the road. The deal breaker for me was the color; I ordered the dusty rose, but it was really much more brownish in person than pictured. I sent it back disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Megan R

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: I've always carried bigger sized bags but lately I've been finding myself just taking my wallet out to carry because I just don't want to lug around my bag anymore. So I decided to look for a crossbody that was small but could hold all the necessities and after reading alot of reviews on this one I decided to try it out. I received it today and I am SO happy with it. There is no weird smell whatsoever! The stitching is all intact. The quality seems great. I could fit everything I wanted to carry and still have room left. Long story short if you're thinking about buying it, do it!
customer_reviews.author: C Chap

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and compact.
customer_reviews.text: This clutch bag is very soft. It has several compartments and holds just enough for occasions where a big purse is not needed. It arrived quickly when promised. When I opened it the wrist strap was missing. A thank you card came with it with an e-mail address for any questions or concerns. I sent an e-mail saying the wrist strap was missing and received an immediate response. The purse was delivered on 6/12 and I received a wrist strap on 6/17. I am very pleased and satisfied with the response from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Rita D.

customer_reviews.title: Great green color.
customer_reviews.text: Its soft vegan leather.. and fantastic that you can you it different ways.. however, the gold color zipper is so bright and cheesey looking, with the "metals" were silver tone and not the gold. You can tell it not a high end bag or something of good quality bc of the hardware. I love the shade of green and lots of of closeable compartments.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Cute but smells weird
customer_reviews.text: This little purse is really cute and serves the purpose I want it to. I only gave it 3 stars though because it smells really weird and I cannot get rid of the smell. It is labeled, "vegan leather". I'm not sure what that is, but maybe thats where the smell comes from. I wanted a small purse for daily use, but the smell is an issue for me so I only use it occasionally. Like I said, its really cute, but the smell is a little much for me.
customer_reviews.author: momofmany

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag: You can dress it up or you can dress it down and it works with both looks impeccably; it's WAY chic; it looks like real leather; it's affordable; the two straps that are sent - one long and one short - are a very nice touch and very convenient at that! I got the bag in gold - because what doesn't a metallic match with, really? - and I've been using it every day! I reached out to their customer service department with an inquiry and got an immediate response and sure appreciated their kindness and professionalism! Thanks, Humble Chic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cross body bag /wristlet
customer_reviews.text: The bag is just ok. Feels soft but looks cheap. It will hold plenty of personal belongings. After being sent the wrong color, I decided to go with the gold, it could easily transition from a day to night bag. Upon receiving the bag I noticed the design of the 'faux' leather was not consistant (the leather had smeared like smudges). The tan bag that was originally sent did not have these smear marks. I would have returned it but I need it for a special occasion and I don't have time for another exchange.
customer_reviews.author: rk

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this crossbody clutch!
customer_reviews.text: Love this purse in general but also love the leopard print. It fits my 8 plus IPhone & it’s in a wallet case, pair of sunglasses, chapstick, lipstick, roller perfume, and car key perfectly. I’m thinking I would also have room for my IPhone cube and cord for charging. This is all I need when I go anywhere but for the ladies that carry big purses, for concerts and athletic events where you can’t bring in big purses, this crossbody is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M Boulanger

customer_reviews.title: Zipper Breaks
customer_reviews.text: This purse has a great layout but the zippers are low quality. This is the second one I’ve owned who’s zipper failed. It skips and gradually pops open. Bummed I missed the chance to return it, I feel for the price, the zipper should be better quality. I wouldn’t recommend buying it unless the manufacturer announces a change to the zippers.
customer_reviews.author: The Learning Erb Schoolhouse

customer_reviews.title: Fine quality, beautiful purse
customer_reviews.text: My mother-in-law really wanted a small purse (with enough space to hold a few items:phone, cigarettes, keys, wallet) so I sent her this purse in ostrich brown. She absolutely loves it! It’s small, but still spacious enough to hold everything she needs, plus some. She actually wants to buy in more colors now. The quality is top notch (detailed, strong stitching, multiple ways to wear, and all metal was finely wrapped in tissue to make sure there were no scuffs or scratches). If you’re considering buying, definitely do it! You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine R.

customer_reviews.title: The clutch that holds everything, beautifully.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black clutch to use at my granddaughter's wedding. It was so perfect, the slide pockets held everything that I needed. I also carried my Samsung Note 9, hand sanitizer, lipstick, mirror, and other accessories without a bulge anywhere. It is so lightweight, ever with all my things in it, that I have been using it all the time. So convenient, that I got another one in the leopard print for Spring. I love using them.
customer_reviews.author: SolaraJ

customer_reviews.title: Great design and organization.
customer_reviews.text: This is PERFECT to go shopping during this period of Covid-19. The two zippers are in the right spot to separate the interior into five sections with the middle section having its own zipper to keep your money. I simply love this bag. The ostrich design gives the bag a very classy look.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, roomy
customer_reviews.text: I just received my new bag, it’s beautiful and very soft, looks very roomy.... I only gave it 2 stars because the strap for the crossbody, which has clasps to hook on both sides of the bag, the clasp is “soldered’ shut and unusable. I will have to use it as a wristlet until I can get another crossbody strap..... it’s a great purse/wallet for traveling or just to run to the store. I love that it fits my IPhone 7S with room to spare...
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Swain

customer_reviews.title: Really nice little purse
customer_reviews.text: I like this even more in person. The leather looks & feels nice - not cheap. (I got black.) There are lots of pockets including card slots while still being smallish. I'm using it as an open "pocket" in my larger purse to hold wallet & keys that I can pull out of my purse & wear with the long strap when running errands or out when I don't need my larger bag purse. The zipper top instead of a flap enables me to leave it open in my purse & just grab my wallet or keys out of my purse when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: The purse I’ve waited my whole life for!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this purse. I think it could use maybe 3 more credit card pockets, but I love it so much that I can’t knock a star for that. It’s compact, but can fit a LOT of stuff. Almost like Mary Poppins’ magic carpetbag. Seriously, though, I keep an iPhone X on one side, and I can keep my car keys on the other side, and not worry about having to dig for them or getting them scratched. Everything is easily accessible - minimal digging around, and the strap is the perfect length.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! I bought it a few years ago at a little mom and pop shop, and was so sad when the zipper broke on it. I searched high and low for this bag and was thrilled when I finally found it. The bag looks like it would be small but somehow has so much room in it for a wristlet/crossbody. It really is the perfect “going out” bag. You can store make up in it for touch ups, and really have no need to store a wallet in it since the middle section acts as one.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this bag.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something small, but also practical, to hold just a bit more than I can fit in my pockets. This bag is perfect, I think it will look great casual and with nicer attire. Love the texture of the black ostrich material. Only thing I might change is to make the gold zipper and hardware a tad less shiny, something duller would suit my taste. Pockets on the inside are great, not too much for a phone, cards, keys, and a couple extra small things.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Wilcoxen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for night out!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small purse for an evening out to match my mauve colored shoes. It was a perfect match as you can see! I loved that the purse was able to store my cell, keys, lipgloss, compact, gum as well as function as a wallet to keep my cash, ID and credit cards separate. It has the feel of soft leather and well made. Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is LOW QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wristlet clutch so much that I purchased it TWICE. The first time, the zipper began to malfunction after 1 month of use and I assumed that it must have been due to my usage. So I repurchased the bag, and I have the SAME issue. For such a lovely bag, I cannot believe that the manufacturer could not put in a decent zipper. What is a bag without a zipper? I am constantly afraid that my belongings will fall out of my bag so I cannot use this anymore. Please use your money to buy another bag if you would like to have something more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WRISTLET!!!! A must buy !!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS WRISTLET.. !!! It is very roomy an has many compartments !!! I can hold so much more in this wristlet then the other wristlet I was using !!! It has ALOT of room. I even put my pepper spray hooked onto the outside loop . I have a I phone 6 plus with outter box an I still have room if I want to put in the compartment that I put my phone in . I really can’t describe it so I will post pics . But this is a VERY GOOD WRISTLET AN I WOULD LIKE TO PURCHASE MORE IN DIFFERENT COLORS..
customer_reviews.author: lynn m.

customer_reviews.title: Beaufiful Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a just a wee bit small but I still LOVE IT. It seems very well made, looks beautiful, and matches the shoes I was trying to match PERFECTLY. The Dusty Rose color is gorgeous. I'm using it for a party and I think it's perfect for that. Even though, as I mentioned, it's a bit small, my phone, wallet and keys fit perfectly (and can fit more because it expands). Did I mention I LOVE THIS BAG???
customer_reviews.author: oc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small purse
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small navy blue purse, not for everyday use, but whenever I go out someplace nice wearing a navy outfit. This is a simple, small design but holds my iPhone 8, eyeglass case and keys, my largest items. The material is very soft, it feels like calfskin! Very versatile and attractive and for a great price. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Gilman

customer_reviews.title: Leopard design looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: Leopard design looks a bit too tacky and cheap, especially the strap! Otherwise it appears to be sturdy and very functional. Just looks like a $10 vinyl purse. Based on so many glowing reviews here, perhaps other design or color may look better. I'm going to try ordering another one to see if it's worth keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: A bit to unshapely in use....
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed with this bag. In my opinion, it is made improperly. The bag does not lay smoothly when you actually start putting much of anything in it. It flares out at the bottom and looks totally unattractive. I was extremely impressed with the material it is made of....so soft and pretty. I purchased two of these and will be giving them to my local thrift shop.
customer_reviews.author: Corralesgal

customer_reviews.title: THE "everything" GO TO
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely recommend this item. Very fine looking and performing material in every way. I purchased two of them in gorgeous fashion colors (gold and turquoise). I use the cross body strap but left the wrist strap on too for accent interest. There is plenty of room for money, cards, glasses, keys, pen, phone (BlackBerry PRIV) and more. Continues to look sleek and perfect. Happy a darling animal did not have to die for me to have the "look" of real skin.
customer_reviews.author: P. Harris

customer_reviews.title: The best clutch purse ever.
customer_reviews.text: I carry a backpack to work and was looking for something that I could put my ID, money, a pair of sunglasses and a few other essentials into you so that when I run out for lunch I don’t have to take my whole backpack. For such a small clutch, this bag can fit a lot of stuff. It’s also soft and a beautiful color. I’m probably gonna buy a few more in other colors!
customer_reviews.author: JustAGirlAndHerCats

customer_reviews.title: Zipper will not last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in October of 2019 and just recently the zipper splits open, it's only happened twice so far but things are not very secure in this bag and if that happens when I don't notice things will fall out. I'm not sure how to get in touch with the company and hate leaving a bad review but the last bag I bought lasted me over 5 years, no it wasn't from this company but I expected at least a couple years. I do not overfill the bag at all. I do love the bag other than this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sanborn

customer_reviews.title: Really nice bag but,...
customer_reviews.text: This is one really nice bag but sadly a tad small for my needs and the strap is not staggered so after putting my stuff in it, it could have flipped . I am one who still goes with the matchy, matchy shoes/bag thing so I need to carry my wallet with me and it doesn't quite fit. Otherwise it would be perfect! so 4 stars it is.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke on two bags
customer_reviews.text: One star because the company sent me a new bag for free fairly promptly. Otherwise, I would give it zero stars if I could. The zipper broke very quickly with the first bag I received and within 3 minutes of using the second bag. Clearly there’s an issue with the zipper which renders the bag unusable. Now I have two broken purses.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Hold much more than you can imagine!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little bag! Bought this for a trip to DC! It holds all the essentials, with great pockets to keep thing organized. Couldn’t believe everything I could get in this! Was able to toss in my large purse, or carry by itself. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: holly

customer_reviews.title: sloppy
customer_reviews.text: If you open both zippers, while you are wearing it slants to the heaviest side and everything falls out... The material and color was great, but should just have 1 zipper it would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Opened to find a fishy smell!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the functionality of this bag. It’s because my purse that goes in my diaper bag because what mama carries around a gigantic purse and a diaper bag these days? But when I opened the packaging, there is a very strong fishy smell on the inside of the purse. I opened it and let it air out but after having it over a month, there still a slight smell to it.
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEY B.

customer_reviews.title: Very lovely! iPhone 6 plus(in case) fits comfortably!
customer_reviews.text: This lovely wristlet arrived the day before my new iPhone. I'd hoped my phone would fit in it. And it did. The vegan leather is buttery soft and a lovely gold color. I am so pleased with it, that I plan on ordering the silver for my sons upcoming wedding. And maybe even more. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: P.L.M. In CT

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap looking, stitching was already coming out before removing it from the plastic. “Metal” parts look very cheap, and the zipper constantly gets stuck. Don’t waste your money, get a higher quality item. You get what you pay for, so this great price, will get you a great piece of crap!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The bag is definitely a very cheap quality. I just received my purse in the mail and the quality is really disappointing, but I guess you get what you pay for. I will be returning this immediately, I thought it would be the perfect little bag for my trip to Europe this month but it seems like my items will get lost due to how easily the fabric tears. The lining is made VERY poorly and the fabric easily rips every time the bag is opened and closed. Don't waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: bellaihernandez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a minimal purse.
customer_reviews.text: This cute little purse is just what I was looking for. Even thought it's small, there are still plenty of sections to hold all the items I need in my purse. I particularly like the fact that the center section remains zipped closed even when the front and back sections are zipped open. Thus keeping my more valuable items secure and not exposed. Good design and nice soft color. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L. Price

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for everyday essentials and a great bargain! It did have a funky smell when I first unboxed it, I see someone else commented about a “fishy” odor. I don’t think it was too bad and was gone within a few hours of using it. I will definitely be purchasing more items from Humble Chic in the future!
customer_reviews.author: M. niederhauser

customer_reviews.title: Love the Vegan Purse
customer_reviews.text: It looks like leather but Is Vegan, so soft and you just wipe it off the clean it with not problem of discoloring. I like vegan leather (oxymoron) It is alway beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Soft and a great size
customer_reviews.text: Just got my new leopard print purse delivered. So far so good! Love how it's sectioned off! I haven't had a chance to use it yet, but looks like it's going to work. I intended to use it for a wedding, but it feels like it's going to be my every day purse for this Fall!
customer_reviews.author: MCL

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good; Smells Bad
customer_reviews.text: I have this crossover in three different colors (this one included) and I like them because they are compact and can hold a lot while keeping you hands free; however, the smell these give off is ghastly!!! I usually have to open them out and let them sit for a few weeks before wearing them. Otherwise, it looks good just buy it long before you actually have to use the first time
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, zipper sometimes sticks
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and roomy. It could be a little smaller for really casual use. Lots of places to put things. There's no coin pocket but I put cash and coins in the center zippered pocket. You do have to hang on to a side to use the zipper as it sometimes sticks.
customer_reviews.author: L. Nottingham

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I previously had one of these bought from a boutique for about $29 and really wanted another one. I was so happy when I saw them on Amazon for about $20. I ordered the taupe for myself and the turquoise for my friend as a birthday gift. Exactly the same size as my boutique one, but this one looks more expensive, which is a major plus. Decided to get them monogrammed and they are perfect for monograming! I will attach a picture of both colors. If anyone is wondering, they have plenty of room to hold everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: Kendal Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Great size, feel and look
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. (I got it in black) It's really nice looking and feeling, and it has 2 good-sized compartments that I split my phone, sunglasses case, lip gloss and small wallet between. I keep my change in the center zipper compartment. It has a built-in card holders but I prefer to use a wallet, so luckily there's enough room for that. I was impressed with the quality of the vegan leather because I've gotten faux bags before that are just cheaply made and don't feel or look that nice. I don't think anyone would assume this isn't real leather.
customer_reviews.author: Mali V

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Purse arrived on time. The color matched my dress perfectly. It's not a bright pink, nor is it a pink with purple tones. My only issue is that it is a little smaller than I anticipated. My fault, I should have read the measurements. I will order it again in another color when I learn to carry less.
customer_reviews.author: Love 2 shop

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheaper in person especially hardware
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this purse wth its very useful compartments but unfortunately this ended up not being as nice as pictured. The vegan leather looked cheap, comparing to other vegan leather I have encountered, but the worst part was the brass zipper and clips for the straps. Very cheap looking and one actually was delivered broken. I promptly returned the purse
customer_reviews.author: Terri Klumann

customer_reviews.title: so it's not the company's fault I don't like it. It is just a little more plump ...
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as described, so it's not the company's fault I don't like it. It is just a little more plump than I wanted when I add all the content. Overall, though, I think it is a great little wristlet and I wouldn't hesitate to get it if you want a cute little (plump) bag. Also, I ordered grey color and it has a tinge of copper to it. Very pretty, but not exactly what I expected when I ordered it. I LOVE that this wristlet is cruelty free. I returned the large one, but would definitely order the smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: The price the great, very cute purse/clutch.
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft vegan leather. The zipper closure is good. This is a nice purse for a long shopping trip or any kind of long day out because it is small yet holds your phone, keys and a little extra. I like the long adjustable strap. It can also me used for a night out clutch, it comes with an attachable wristlet strap. I will definitely be buying other colors to go with other outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Lovinmysunnylife

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size & color!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a bag that was small but not to small ...this bag was exactly what I had in mind. Roomy enough to carry essentials to a wedding but small enough to not take up a lot of space. Just love it...and love that it is "vegan" leather to.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Not to my liking
customer_reviews.text: I have the black wristlet which I like but wanted a crossbody and something a tad bigger for travel. I bought what is supposed to be saddle brown but it's more like orange. It looks kind of cheap and the zipper doesn't close all the way. This will be going back.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice handbag. So soft to the touch and fits a lot of things. My iPhone 11 fits in it
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: On my wife's Xmas gift list, and it was a hit
customer_reviews.text: My wife asked for this for Christmas, and she's quite pleased with both the size and the overall quality. She says she particularly likes how the bag expands to hold more. My own impression is that the quality of the "leather" is quite remarkable. So, if my wife is happy with it, it's a winner!
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Thom

customer_reviews.title: Functionality and cruelty free!
customer_reviews.text: I take this wristlet with me almost everywhere! It has plenty of space to store your phone, cards and any other personal items. I can even fit a travel size VS body spray in there. But, my favorite part is it is cruelty free!!! So important and it is so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not Rose Gold and Too Small
customer_reviews.text: The vegan leather is the only reason this product gets any stars - it's incredibly soft and beautiful. However, this is not rose gold; it's a platinum/silvery gold. Also, I think I was sent the wrong product as it doesn't fit anything in it! NOTHING. Don't get this if you want to fit a wallet, phone, and keys because it will NOT work. Seller refused refund - disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty purse but the zipper did brake
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a year ago. I used it as my main purse for quite a while. The texture of the purse has a nice soft faux leather feel. The purse is big enough to hold your phone and a few lip glosses without being too bulky. The crossbody strap is adjustable and has plenty of length. I am only giving it three stars because after using it for my main purse the past year the zipper finally gave out. The zipper no longer stays zipped, and gaps open. However for the price I can't be too mad.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice small bag, makes your outfit pop.holds cell phone, small wallet, keys makeup. functions as a wristlet, and a crossbody. I purchased two one (gunmetal) was missing wristlet strap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Light Bag; Not Rose Gold
customer_reviews.text: Great for days that I don’t want to lug a lot of heavy crap. The opening as others have mentioned is awkward. I haven’t dropped anything from it, but I’m being mindful. It’s not a true rose gold. Just gold, with the tinniest hint of a coppery color.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and perfect for holding my cell phone while at parties an outings where I don't want a heavy purse. It has a place for credit cards and is very roomy and light. You will need to keep it zipped up or it will flop open. Also, it was an odor but I think that will fade with time.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Zipper opens
customer_reviews.text: Pro - leather and simply designed. - good capacity for the purse. Con - The zipper is not secured that can be opened. - The strap is too thin for the size of the purse that gives the shoulder pain.
customer_reviews.author: Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use for evenings when a large purse was not needed. I really like it and love all of the pockets inside. The “ leather” looks like hair but is a soft vegan leatjer. I would recommend the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JMay

customer_reviews.title: Great bag/wallet
customer_reviews.text: Love this little bag. It’s a bit flimsy but has held up very well so far. The zipper can be a little tough at times but not a problem for me overall. I use it as a wallet but can grab it easily for a clutch or throw it in a diaper bag. Perfect for my needs!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to zip it closed or it all hangs out, light weight
customer_reviews.text: Really light and I like it. However my wallet cannot fit in the middle to keep it zipped. I still use my wallet but I have to make sure I zip it all or it will fall out. Otherwise I am really happy as we are city dwellers and a lighter purse is best on long walks. Plus I have shoulder/neck issues and a light purse has been much better
customer_reviews.author: K. Brandst

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: Over all this is a pretty decent bag. It holds a lot more than I expected because of the way that the different pockets expand and I like that it has both the wristlet and cross body options. The material that it is made out of is just okay and feels a bit flimsy, also I noticed that the main zipper has a tendency to slide open while you're wearing it, I was able to deal with this by clipping it to the strap. Overall it suited my needs at a reasonable price, but I don't think I'd buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: S Wingo

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is exactly what i was looking for. It comes with 2 straps, 1 for a wristlet and the other to make it a purse. The material is great! Everybody has complimented it and I can fit all my stuff in it and my phone is a large LG phone that fits. For the price, it is amazing. As for the very critical reviews, don't listen. If ypu want an inexpensive and very nice little bag, go for this.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rickert

customer_reviews.title: Very cute with lots of compartments!
customer_reviews.text: It's small enough to throw in my larger purse so I don't have to do a whole purse switch every time I want to take a smaller purse somewhere - I just grab this smaller purse out of my larger one and go! It has 2 larger compartments for things like a cell phone, lotion, and lipgloss and a smaller compartment for a pen and hair ties, cash, and then 6 credit card slots. It's perfect! And the green color is very cute.
customer_reviews.author: nancy semenko

customer_reviews.title: Love this wine color (deep red/burgundy) and it's exactly the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute purse!! Love this wine color (deep red/burgundy) and it's exactly the size that I like when going out at night. It has credit card slots & pockets for cash so you don't need a separate wallet. It also has 2 larger zippered sections for any other necessities (like cell phone and lip gloss, etc).
customer_reviews.author: SDB

customer_reviews.title: My favorite crossbody!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these bags. One in nude for me and the other in black for my best friend. We both love this bag! It fits a lot for its size. I'm not the type of girl that carries large totes and handbags around. So being able to carry all my essentials and then a bit of my mom bag with me is great. I've been using mine for over 5 months and there hasn't been any tearing or holes. I might even buy another one in the navy color for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. Couldn't get the smell out of the bag. And didn't like how the one zipper exposed all the pockets. Would have preferred a zipper for each pocket.
customer_reviews.author: kfsurvivor

customer_reviews.title: Shines like GOLD
customer_reviews.text: It's gold and it's shiny and you put things in it . . . The photo here does not do this bag justice at all - it's GOLD, straight up gold. And soft, supple and simple. My only complaint is a temporary one - some of the folds that hold the credit cards are super tight and cards barely barely fit, but I suspect they will loosen up a little over time.
customer_reviews.author: Gayla Drake

customer_reviews.title: It has a lot of room for a cross body.  Beautiful color & adjustable long strap.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little big bag. It has room for everything I need when I go shopping. I don't have to worry about anyone taking it because it's a cross body. The purple color is beautiful. It has 3 separate compartments. It holds my credit card holder, telephone, keys & anything else I may need while I'm shopping. Also has slots for your cards. The middle compartment zips & there is one big zipper that zips outer compartments together giving the middle compartment double protection.
customer_reviews.author: Scgirl5588

customer_reviews.title: Not too big, Not too small...just right!
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have shoulder option/clutch handle. Able to fit phone, make up accessories, etc--3 compartments. Dressy enough for a night out---pebble look/feel. Used it for sons wedding!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Savaglio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bag. Feels and looks like real leather. Holds quite a lot for its size. Plenty of places for credit cards, keys, cell, cash, cigs...pretty much whatever you need to carry when you aren't using a large handbag. The cross body strap is adjustable & can be converted to use it as a shoulder bag, if you prefer, plus you get a wrist strap. I feel it's perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: Elyse Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great for long days out.
customer_reviews.text: I love this small cross body bag. I use it when I’m going to be out and about all day and don’t want the weight of a regular size bag. Carries the basic essentials (unless you feel you must take your entire makeup kit). I highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Merilee Manprin

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not compromised due to being vegan leather.
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of the fabric. The bag looks exactly like the picture. Its three compartments are roomy and able to fit my cell phone, readers, key fob, and other essentials without looking bulky. Looks great either cross-body, on the shoulder, or as a wristlet. I live it and recommend to cheetah/leopard print lovers.
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: So the design is super cute, but it smells
customer_reviews.text: So the design is super cute, but it smells, terrible, like fish or poop!!! I have bathed it in Fabreeze three times already since my purchase about a week ago (it still smells really bad) and am now sitting it outside to see if that works. If not I'll have to return it. :(
customer_reviews.author: L Rhinehart

customer_reviews.title: which is pretty big for a phone
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I was looking for. I am a new mom and right now, I use a tiny keychain Kate Spade wallet that just holds my license, a couple cards, and cash, which goes from my pump bag for work to diaper bag to now this crossbody bag. This bag is able to hold that wallet plus my keys, plus my huge iPhone 6s plus, which is pretty big for a phone. It is a simple bag but it is cheap and yet durable. I am able to use this bag instead of stuffing my wallet into the diaper bag, which is sometimes a pain to get to when I'm out and about with my family.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Packaged nicely. Looking forward to trying it out and seeing ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as much of a pink undertone as depicted in picture. Slight odor but not totally off putting. Soft feeling, looks decently made, and lots of pockets to stay organized. Packaged nicely. Looking forward to trying it out and seeing how useful it is. Would have given in 5 stars if Color was more pink like I was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: sB

customer_reviews.title: Nice purse, for the price
customer_reviews.text: The leather feels very nice and soft, and after a month, it seems to be holding up well. The strap is very thin, but seems to be strong, so overall, I like the light-weight feel. The zipper is doing fine, even though I have stuffed my purse a couple of times. It fits my phone, keys, cash, change, credit cards and a few other small items easily.
customer_reviews.author: papagena

customer_reviews.title: and I liked that it came with the crossbody strap and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent bag for the price. It holds a lot, and I liked that it came with the crossbody strap and the wristlet strap. But it poofs out kind of strangely when you put lots in it because of how it's like two separate purses stitched together with a coin purse in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Well made smaller purse
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a smaller purse. This is perfect. My only complaint is that there are too few credit card slots.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Elegant bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Just right for an elegant event. Love the soft material and really looks like leather. Definitely recommend it! I have it in 3 colors.
customer_reviews.author: lampgail

customer_reviews.title: Having a small clutch bag to match all of my shoes because I personally don't like large bags.
customer_reviews.text: Was planning to use every time I wore my shoes that match an outfit. However, upon opening the bag the odor inside is very unpleasant. I have left open since receiving and as of this morning, April 24th, the odor is still unpleasant. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: RPB

customer_reviews.title: I am a Leopard freak
customer_reviews.text: So cute! It’s lightweight with a lot of space to put my phone, keys, cards, money, tampons lol! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Love this Crossbody
customer_reviews.text: Love this Crossbody!!! This is the second one that I bought. It is very functional and has so many compartments. Everything fits into this bag. It is a soft leather. I am actually going to buy another one in another color. I would definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Swaim

customer_reviews.title: Great Purse - Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with thie quality of this wristlet - it is very soft! It was more roomier inside than I expected it to be and has just enough compartments to where it’s easily manageable and convenient. Even though I prefer to use it as a wristlett, it also comes with a long strap to wear as a cross body which makes it very versatile. I would definitely consider purchasing another one in a different color as there are many to choose from. I’d highly recommend this purse if you are someone like me who was just looking for a simple wristlet for everyday use that would hold all of my stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is broken
customer_reviews.text: This was a very pretty color and a nicesoft leather-like feel. It was also the prefect size, but thezipper was broken from the start. It would pull apart (and the bag was not over full). It rendered the bag almost useless.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie H. Dakters

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Every Occassion
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these at home as a local store sells them (sometimes) but I needed a new one. I wear them out! It is perfect for every occasion and is the perfect size. I do not want to have to change purses when I go out/work/travel so this is a one size fits all. Plus it’s vegan!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Columbus

customer_reviews.title: This is just ok
customer_reviews.text: This is just ok. I use it but it appears cheap and is bulkier than I wanted. It is top heavy and wants to flip on occasion loosing every thing from the pockets. When it is unzipped everything from the two side pockets are exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it but...
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this! However, i bought this a couple of months ago... as soon as i got it the zipper was off track and messed up. I fixed it but almost every time i unzip and try to zip it back up the zipper gets off track which is really annoying. ive dumped everything out of it thinking it was actually zipped when it tipped over several times. I wish I didnt have the zipper issue and i would love it. However, i dont want to put anymore money in buying another because im scared of having that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Bullard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Simple yet small wallet. I bought this to replace my smaller wristlet. I love the options of length for the strap. It can also turn into a clutch or wristlet. One down side is the zipper can get stuck and is of poor quality. I’ve edited my previous review. I have had this purse for a few months now and I use it as a back up purse. One side where the strap attaches tore which was a huge bummer. Quality is so-so.
customer_reviews.author: felicia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to stick in the diaper bag where I could just grab and go if I don't need the diaper bag. It holds my phone, keys, and all the necessities without being bulky or awkward. The leather feels amazing too!
customer_reviews.author: adam atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Replacing A Large Oversized Handbag!
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these Humble Chic Vegan Leather Small Bags and they are priceless. Surprising how much they hold and comfortably. A good friend for sure!!! Looking forward to ordering more colors. Sincere thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Claire K. Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Great big little bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great, soft roomy bag. My only "complaint" would be I wish there was a small fabric pocket, (zippered would be wonderful,) to hold smaller, more fragile or personal items securely. Great that it's vegan. No one would never know it's not real leather! The shoulder strap allows for almost limitless options in length, too. Nice color options, although a soft grey would be nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Cheesehead

customer_reviews.title: Cute and practical! Then it broke :(
customer_reviews.text: Origional review at the bottom. Used as a secondary purse and 9 months later the zipper broke. Really bummed. Bought this for a trip to keep basic essenials on me. Perfect and really cute! Lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: sullyams

product_meta.title: Humble Chic Vegan Leather Wristlet Clutch or Small Purse Crossbody Bag, Includes Adjustable Shoulder and Wrist Straps
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Package Dimensions :8.4 x 5.5 x 1.3 inches; 7.2 Ounces
 * Item model number :VEGlrg225-0026
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :October 26, 2018
 * Manufacturer :Humble Chic NY
 * ASIN :B07JMN3TNH

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #37,666 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #18528 inWomen's Shops 
    *  #166 inWomen's Shoulder Handbags 
    *  #16 inWomen's Wristlet Handbags 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.3 out of 5 stars945 ratings
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY - Vegan Leather / Gold-tone hardware.
BRAND NEW - Hand packaged with love in the USA.

ELEGANT DESIGN & SUPERIOR QUALITY - This stylish convertible mini cross body handbag comes with detachable long and short straps, for a perfect transition from day to night. The adjustable long strap option will convert your small crossbody purse from a cross body to a shoulder bag, and even a belt bag or modern fanny pack. A multi-pocket interior holds valuables and essentials including iPhone and other popular smartphones.

CUSTOMER SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - All Humble Chic products are fulfilled by Amazon and eligible for 100% free returns for 30 days. Enjoy a RISK FREE purchase today. Search or click on "Humble Chic NY" to see our complete collection on Amazon.

AUTHENTIC BRANDED ITEM - Humble Chic NY is an American owned company based in New York City, and the only authorized seller of this original product. Beware of inferior imitations. The perfect present for yourself or loved ones, for birthdays, anniversaries, your bridesmaids, or bridal party. Choose this special gift to show your love and friendship to your wife, daughter or friends.

SIZING - Approximate Measurements: 5" x 8" plus 2 included straps. A multi-pocket interior holds valuables and essentials including all smartphones and iPhone editions including 6s Plus / 7 Plus / 8 Plus / X Max.

CARE TIPS - Vegan leather is a high quality, scratch-resistant, lightweight synthetic material that feels and wears like soft leather. Vegan Leather is a luxurious yet durable scratch-resistant synthetic faux leather, which is soft to the touch, water resistant, and easy to clean with a damp washcloth or towel. Due to monitor differences, colors online may vary slightly from their appearance in person.
